view

Class ViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View

    public final class ViewImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements View
    An implementation of View.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewImpl()
      Creates a new instance containing a new InitialWindow, a new CraftWindow and a new GameWindow.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewImpl

        public ViewImpl()
        Creates a new instance containing a new InitialWindow, a new CraftWindow and a new GameWindow. A controller must be set afterwards construction before the first use.
